summary: The son of Django searches for the murderer of his father and is thereby involved in a war between two factions headed by former acquaintances of his famous parent.
cast: Guy Madison|Gabriele Tinti|Ingrid Schoeller|Daniele Vargas|Ignazio Spalla|Andrea Scotti|Roberto Messina|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Cristina Penz|Luigi Ciavarro|Franco Gul√†|Lucio De Santis|Luciano Rossi|Renato Mambor|John Bartha|Giuseppe Castellano|Giorgio Dionisio|Piero Morgia|Remo Capitani|Carol Danell|Alberigo Donadeo|Rocco Lerro|Osiride Pevarello|Attilio Severini|Franco Ukmar|The Wilder Brothers|Gregorio Wu
title: El hijo de Django
